job.title: Senior Developer
brief: Working on Devon's Local Government e-Enablement project, I was responsible for the design, development & maintenance of the reporting infrastructure using Crystal Reports & Oracle data-sources. I maintained & administered the associated Business Objects servers. Much of the work involved data analysis, writing complex SQL queries & providing advice to staff & contractors on the use of Crystal Reports, writing SQL queries & procedures & the use of client tools including PLSQL.
